summary: A reporter casts a fake Bin Laden to act in his video message to America, so he can immigrate there.
cast: Ali Zafar|Pradhuman Singh|Piyush Mishra|Nikhil Ratnaparkhi|Chirag Vohra|Sugandha Garg|Rahul Singh|Chinmay Mandlekar|Rajendra Sethi|Seema Bhargava|Barry John|Masood Akhtar|Indivar Bhatia|Akash Dhar|Armen Grayg|Badrul Islam|Harry Josh|Jay Parkash|Vakshay Verma
title: Tere Bin Laden
